thread.title: Travis Slusher
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by Travis Slusher

author: Travis Slusher
title: Travis Slusher
text: American Frieght is amazing!! Would highly recommend them to anyone! The entire staff was very courteous and helpful. We got there about 30 minutes before they closed, where most people would kind of just try to rush you out, it was quite the opposite there. The people were awesome, prices were fantastic, and it was just a really great experience!
